pr_title: DHFPROD-4224: Start export of search results directly from the table …

timeline.bodyText: We can remove this test, since it is being verified in line 38 and it is better there since there are assertions following the click event. This test with 1 line of click can be deleted as it adds no value.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: Thanks Srikanth, I added fix in the pr 3937.
replies.author: timur-isangulov

timeline.bodyText: Is this expected to be selected by default? Assertion in line 35 doesnt seem to have a click event. If it is supposed to be selected by default, then this one line test again adds no value. There are no assertions here so it will always pass the click event and fail only if "All" is missing from the dom. I would recommend deleting this test.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: Thanks Srikanth, I added fix in the pr 3937.
replies.author: timur-isangulov

timeline.bodyText:
Some of the assertions in this test is being tested again in test 4 - line 29. I will again getting rid of this test and asserting for elements within functional tests which really test something.
This test is only asserting checkboxes are present in the dom. Line 14 from this test is repeated in line 37 (test 4). So if "All" is missing in the dom both the test will fail with same reason and it adds to the maintenance of fixing same failures in multiple places. If there was a different action being performed to assert this, then it would make sense. Otherwise this is just duplicative.
timeline.author: bsrikan

replies.bodyText: Thanks Srikanth, I added fix in the pr 3937.
replies.author: timur-isangulov
